trans-unit.source: Contains extended error information about an error that occurred when the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Invoke*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações de erro expandidas sobre o erro que ocorreram quando o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Invoke*>método é chamado.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Invoke*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"></xref> class with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"> </xref> classe com a cadeia especificada.

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem que descreve o erro.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"></xref> class with the specified serialization information and streaming context.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"> </xref> classe com as informações de serialização especificado e o contexto de transmissão em fluxo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"></xref> class with the specified string and exception.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"> </xref> classe com a cadeia especificada e exceções.

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem que descreve o erro.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: A exceção é a causa da exceção atual.
Obtém o código de erro expandidas.
Obtém a mensagem de erro expandidas.

trans-unit.source: Populates the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Povoa o <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto com os dados necessários para serializar o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto para preencher com dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that is the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>objeto que é o destino para esta serialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
